tasks.task: Setting up an off-grid garden irrigation system
subtasks: Obtaining necessary components (irrigation kit, solar panels, charger, well pump, etc.)
Installing solar panels and charge controller
Connecting the well pump to the solar charging system and timer
Assembling the irrigation tank and float valve
Installing the drip irrigation system (drip tape, drip lines, header pipes)
Ensuring proper pressure and adjusting if necessary (e.g., adding a pressure regulator)

tasks.task: Checking system functionality during precipitation
subtasks: Observing system performance during rain
Potential adjustments or additional setup based on real-world testing

tasks.task: Mounting solar panels on a crate structure
subtasks: Assembling the crate frame (using pallet and sides)
Securing two 100-watt solar panels to the crate
Connecting solar panels to the charge controller

tasks.task: Setting up the well pump with a timer
subtasks: Installing the pump inside the irrigation tank
Connecting the pump to the charge controller via the timer
Configuring the timer for automatic on/off functionality

tasks.task: Assembling the irrigation tank and float valve
subtasks: Drilling holes in the tank lid for wires and hose
Installing the float valve mechanism inside the tank
Connecting the drip irrigation system to the tank (pressurized water)

tasks.task: Configuring the drip irrigation setup
subtasks: Attaching drip tape to the header pipes
Ensuring proper spacing and coverage for the beds

tasks.task: Calibrating system pressure
subtasks: Adjusting the system pressure (considering initial overpressure) for optimal performance
Installing a pressure regulator if necessary (due to high initial pressure)

tasks.task: Testing system functionality during rain
subtasks: Observing water distribution during precipitation
Making any necessary adjustments to prevent waterlogging or overwatering

tasks.task: Final review and adjustments
subtasks: Inspecting all connections for leaks or looseness
Starting the well pump manually to check performance and pressure gauge reading
Fine-tuning system components as needed (e.g., pressure regulator, pump speed)
